title: PDENZG Marble Luxurious Golden Runner Rug,80x150cm, Marble Ink Painting Abstract Art Home Decor Gold Carpet, Non-Slip Easy Care Runner Carpet, for Bedroom Kitchen Hallway Home Decor Mat
features: 【Soft & Non-Slip Marble Runner Rug】 – Made from plush, soft material with a non-slip backing, this marble runner rug provides both comfort and safety. Perfect as a hallway runner, kitchen rug, or door runner mat indoor, it stays securely in place.

【Easy to Clean & Machine Washable】 – Spills and stains are no problem! This washable runner rug is easy to clean and machine washable, making it a practical choice for high-traffic areas like kitchen mats or hallway runner non slip.

【Luxury Marble Design for Any Space】 – Featuring an elegant marble rug pattern with gold accents, this runner rug adds a touch of light luxury design to hallways, kitchens, or entryways. Also available in grey runner rug for versatile decor.

【Durable & Versatile for High-Traffic Areas】 – Designed as a long hallway runner rug or carpet runners for hallways, it withstands daily wear while enhancing your home’s style. Ideal for rug runners for hallways or kitchen accessories and decor.

【Secure & Stable for Safety】 – The non slip runner base ensures stability on hardwood or tile floors, making it perfect as hallway runner non slip or kitchen mats non slip washable. A stylish and functional addition to any home!
description: Gold Marble Runner Rug – Luxury Non-Slip Hallway Carpet with Premium Safety Features Elevate your home decor with our Gold Marble Runner Rug, combining elegant marble-patterned luxury with family-friendly functionality. This versatile hallway runner features a sophisticated gold-veined design that instantly upgrades any space while providing practical benefits for busy households. Premium Safety & Comfort Features: ✅ Children & Pets Friendly – Ultra-soft surface is gentle on little hands and paws ✅ Very Non-Slip & Stable – Advanced grip backing prevents shifting and sliding ✅ Silent & Noise-Reducing – Moderate thickness absorbs footsteps for quieter movement ✅ Soft & Absorbent – Plush fibers trap dirt and moisture at your entryway Practical Living Solutions: (1) Moderate Thickness (0.4") stays perfectly flat without curling edges (2) Easy to Carry & Foldable – Lightweight design simplifies moving and storage (3) Machine Washable – Maintains like-new appearance wash after wash Perfect for: Grand entryway first impressions Protecting hardwood in high-traffic hallways Adding luxury to kitchen floors Creating safe play pathways for kids and pets Available in multiple lengths to fit any space. The ultimate combination of safety, style and easy maintenance for modern homes! Includes: 1x Gold Marble Runner Rug (select your size) Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low Transform your floors with this washable, non-slip luxury runner that works as hard as your family does!
